column4: Guys where can I fix sound card indecies? I mean, I want my SB be card-0, and VIA - card-1...
and how can I restart all alsa-modules then? I didn't found anything in /etc/init.d/
in /etc/asound.conf afaik in the alsa website there is a how to
as I remember from holy distro gentoo there was something about modules aliases and etc... :| k, i'll google deeply
